data.title: Reliable Barbeque!
data.text: Dickey's Barbeque is always cooked to perfection fresh favorable and very reliable!  Great place for a quick lunch or dinner and even better place to order dinners for larger groups! Very nice manager and employees!

data.title: Poor service and management, good food when they have it.
data.text: This would have been my second time eating at this location while on vacation. Because of my experience I'll never eat at another Dickies ever again. I walked in and waited 10 minutes to order a rib plate and was told by Nick that they were out of ribs, but, a new batch of ribs would be done in 30 minutes. I went to my car and waited. When I returned Nick and Brianna then said they would not have any ribs for the rest of the night and it was 6pm. How does a BBQ Pit NOT have ribs at dinner time!?! I then ordered the brisket. When I checked the order before I left, I saw that the brisket was thrown into the carry out container and a complete mess. I refunded the order and poor Brianna didn't know how to operate the register. An hour later and I'm hungry and empty handed. While I waited and waited for nothing, I noticed that the food prep area was a complete mess! I also noticed that several people left because service was so slow. I then drove to Bakers Ribs and had a rib platter within 6 minutes via their drive-thru. If I ever return to Dallas, I won't  return to Dickies!

data.title: Good and Quick
data.text: It was a pretty decent mea when you are in a hurry.  Not haut cuisine, but there was nothing truly wrong with it.

data.title: Some of the best BBQ restaurants in North Texas
data.text: The food is excellent.  BBQ is fall apart, cut with a fork tender.  The sauce is always on the side except for the chopped sandwiches.  The sides are fresh , varied and hard to choose.  I especially like the fried okra and cucumber/tomato salad.  They have a large condiment table where you can get the onions, pickles, jalapeños. etc.

data.title: Love the ribs, turkey and ham
data.text: Usually dependable and good.  We almost always enjoy dickeys but it was very unkept and dirty the night we went to eat.  We will go again soon...not the usual for them.

data.title: Always consistently good
data.text: Dickey's Barbeque is very good barbecue....maybe not the very best, but definitely consistent.  We even found a Dickey's in Carson City NV and had a great meal.....felt like home.  It was good to know that you will get consistent flavors and menu items whereever you go, yet it retains its down-home atmosphere.

data.title: great take out
data.text: The food is great a little pricy tho. The staff is very friendly.

data.title: Fair BBQ.  Doesn't touch...
data.text: Fair BBQ.  Doesn't touch the greatness of Sammy Walker's.
